channel.title: RS07 - Need help cropping so no bars on side - iMovie - Found a solution kinda?
channel.description:
Can someone hit me up with a guide to successfully crop RuneScape footage in iMovie? When I go to crop it normally, it won't include all of the RuneScape client.
Example of the issue: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nSK55Er2PVk
EDIT: STILL NEED HELP
EDIT2: I put "yt:stretch=16:9" into the tags and it fixed - Could use a more perm solution tho

item.title: RS07 - Need help cropping so no bars on side - iMovie - Found a solution kinda?

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Tbh I think youtube has a built in crop tool…
